reviews.review_content:
Best way to say it is fair minded. She can go fast in lecture, but her notes are fairly clear. The problem sets are extremely long, and she is a strict grader when it comes to the exams. This is relatively fair though, as all her exam questions are straightforward.
Workload:
Long problem sets due every 2 weeks. Quizzes, midterm, final. The quizzes are scheduled. An additional cheat sheet allowed for each quiz or exam, so by the end you are allowed 5 sheets (and you will need all of them for the material).
